idea-plugin.name: Launch URL from String
idea-plugin.description:
Background

Out of the box IntelliJ lets you define Regular Expressions to turn plain-text entries in your check-in comments and branch names into hyperlinks. The rules for doing this are defined on the VCS settings screen "Issue Navigation".

This Plugin

This plugin applies those same rules to quoted literal strings in source code in any of the following languages:
  • Dart
  • Gosu
  • Java
  • JavaScript
  • Kotlin
  • Scala
  • Php
  • Python
  • XML (applied to attributes and element text)
Now annotations like 
@TestCase("DEVCCPERF-142")
become hyperlinks, too.
Of course you can define link patterns to go anywhere you like: for instance you could link 
[Ww]ikipedia:(.*)
to 
http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=$1
